# kiwi-empty

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                             | Type                             | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `containerClass` | `container-class` | Additional css class to apply to the container.                                                         | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `glyphicon`      | `glyphicon`       | The name of the glyphicon icon to use. So if you want to render a `glyphicon-ok` pass `ok` as the name. | `string`                         | `'inbox'`   |
| `icon`           | `icon`            | Provide a custom class to use instead of glyphicons.                                                    | `string \| undefined`            | `undefined` |
| `size`           | `size`            | The size of the icon.                                                                                   | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'large'`   |
| `withContent`    | `with-content`    | Show optional content below the icon.                                                                   | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
